dmca.title: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Tuesday, October 10, 2006 5:47 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement Subject: [EV1-C1302588I] Notice of Copyright Infringement ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Notice of Copyright Infringement Added by system at Tuesday, Oct 10 2006 09:32 pm X-MailFrom: pank@extremepixels.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Oct 10 22:30:05 2006 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:58 -0500 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:58 -0500 Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from pank@extremepixels.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GXUmA-0002jG-Nl for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:58 -0500 Received: from iapetus.site5.com ([70.47.36.8] helo=moiras.site5.com) by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from pank@extremepixels.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1GXUlz-000GxG-3A for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:47 -0500 Received: from c-24-14-144-24.hsd1.il.comcast.net ([24.14.144.24] helo=[192.168.0.3]) by moiras.site5.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.52) id 1GXUli-0001en-6f for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 10 Oct 2006 23:28:30 -0400 User-Agent: Microsoft-Entourage/11.2.5.060620 Date: Tue, 10 Oct 2006 22:28:34 -0500 Subject: Notice of Copyright Infringement From: Bob Pankala To: Message-ID: Thread-Topic: Notice of Copyright Infringement Thread-Index: Acbs5VS9kwTrMVjYEduMdgANky6yDA== Mime-version: 1.0 Content-type: multipart/alternative; boundary="B_3243364120_10949042" X-Antivirus-Scanner: This message has been scanned by ClamAV. X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - moiras.site5.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - theplanet.com X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [0 0] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - extremepixels.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 70.47.36.8 is neither permitted nor denied by domain of extremepixels.com) client-ip=70.47.36.8; envelope-from=pank@extremepixels.com; helo=moiras.site5.com; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Oct 2006 03:28:58.0506 (UTC) FILETIME=[6358AEA0:01C6ECE5] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) > This message is in MIME format. Since your mail reader does not > understand this format, some or all of this message may not be legible. MIME element (text/plain) NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT Date: 10-10-06 Hello, I am the owner and creator of eXtremepixels.com who exclusively own professional, commercial forum designs and graphics. Your network is being used to offer that software illegally. The software may be a full version, a hack, crack or security key as detailed below. According to traceroutes and a whois search it appears you are the supplier of the below server. They are illegally using and illegally re-distributing my commercial products. Location: http://www.darkwebhosting.net/files/IPB_centura.rar http://74.52.59.194/~hosted/forums/index.php? Files: Extremepixels forum skins Please remove the files and prevent future abuse. Thank you. MIME element (text/html) Notice of Copyright Infringement NOTIFICATION OF COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT
 
Date: 10-10-06

Hello,

I am the owner and creator of eXtremepixels.com who exclusively own professional, commercial forum designs and graphics.

Your network is being used to offer that software illegally.  The
software may be a full version, a hack, crack or security key as detailed
below.

According to traceroutes and a whois search it appears you are the supplier of the below server. They are illegally using and illegally re-distributing my commercial products.

Location:
http://www.da rkwebhosting.net/files/IPB_centura.rar
http://74.52.59.194 /~hosted/forums/index.php?


Files:
